```{r}
library(tidyverse, palmerpenguins)


```

```{r}
# create an expression ----
fx <- expression(x^2)

# evaluate at x = 3
x = 3

# find the deriv with respect to x ----
dfdx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
dfdx

# Find the slope at x = 3 -----

eval(dfdx)
```

```{r}
# create an expression ----
Pa <- expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^4 - 5)

# evaluate at a = 1.2----
a = 1.2

# find the deriv with respect to x ----
dPdx <- D(expr = Pa, name = "a")
dPdx

# Find the slope at a = 1.2
eval(dPdx)
```
